snippet.title: Johnny Depp gave THIS nickname to Leonardo DiCaprio, alleges Amber Heard
snippet.description:
TItle: Johnny Depp gave THIS nickname to Leonardo DiCaprio, alleges Amber Heard

Read More Stories Here: www.haveitalldaily.com 

Description: Divorce between actor #JohnnyDepp and his ex-wife #AmberHeard is getting murkier as many inside stories are getting revealed in an attempt to malign each other’s public image.  
Latest addition to such claims is that the actor had allegedly accused his ex-wife Amber Heard of having affairs with many of her co-stars and the list even includes Leonardo DiCaprio.
In an attempt to prove that Johnny Depp was a jealous husband Amber Heard had revealed that Depp had given a nickname to many of the stars she has worked with.
According to reports from Express & Star, Amber Heard said that Johnny Depp accused her of having affairs with each of her co-star's movie after movie, including Eddie Redmayne, James Franco, Jim Sturgess, Kevin Costner, Liam Hemsworth, Billy-Bob Thornton, Channing Tatum and even women co-stars like Kelly Garner. 
Amber Heard revealed that Johnny Depp also accused her of having affairs with stars that she auditioned with, like Leonardo DiCaprio. 
She said that Johnny Depp would taunt her about it, especially when he was drunk or high, and had given derogatory nicknames for every one of her male co-stars that he considered a threat to his relationship with Amber.
Amber Heard revealed that Johnny Depp has given Leonardo DiCaprio the nickname 'pumpkin-head'. He also gave Channing Tatum the nickname of a 'potato-head' and 'Jim Turd Sturgess'.
In a witness statement filed as part of Johnny Depp's High Court libel case against the actor over allegations of domestic violence, Amber Heard said that Johnny Depp demanded to know about all the romantic scenes in her movies and complained about how people can watch her 'get f***ed on camera'. 
She said that he would insist on every male actor that she was working with was trying to sleep with her or she has had an affair with him. 
Amber Heard also revealed that Johnny Depp would try to catch her out by taking her phone or telling her someone had told him that she was having an affair and act as if he had information proving it when she really had not done anything.

Amber Heard said that without even asking her Johnny Depp would even get himself copies of the scripts that she would be looking at, in order to review the scripts for himself. 
Now no one knows the right or wrong and what is true in all this, but calling Leonardo DiCaprio 'pumpkin-head’ is not fair, either he said it or she just made it up.
tags: Entertainment News Have It All Daily
johnny depp amber heard leonardo dicaprio
johnny depp amber heard new audio
amber heard abusive to johnny depp
